Describe this story and any requirements it should adhere to.

Checklist
- [ ] All acceptance criteria met
- [ ] Unit tests written & green
- [ ] Code reviewed
- [ ] Accessibility checked
- [ ] Feature documented
- [ ] Visual regression tests pass
- [ ] Pull request merged with main
